data.actual_result: The Checkbox on the button, and the channel icon on the left menu flash rapidly.
data.expected_result: Channel mutes and unmutes without problem
data.short_description: When Double Clicking A Channel Mute Button, The Button And The Channel Flash Rapidly
data.steps_to_repro: - Double-click the "Mute #ChannelOfYourChoice - Observe the button's checkbox and the channel in the left menu
